lines.gurmukhi: nwieku hY eyku Aru nwiekw Ast qw kY; eyk eyk nwiekw ky pwNc pwNc pUq hY [

Unknown.translation: There is only one master of the house. He has eight wives and each wife has five sons.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ie`k qwˆ sÍwmI hY Awp qy A`T hn iqs dIAwˆ sÍwimnIAwˆ, Aru Pyr eyk eyk hr iek iesqRI dy hYˆngy pMj pMj puqR[

lines.gurmukhi: eyk eyk pUq igRh cwir cwir nwqI; eykY eykY nwqI doie pqnI pRsUq hY [

Unknown.translation: Every son has four sons. Thus every grandson of the master has two child-bearing wives.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: aus iek iek puqR dy Gr Agy cwr cwr Es dy poqRy hoey Aqy hr iek poqRy dIAwˆ do do vOhtIAwˆ Pyr bÎweIAwˆ hoeIAwˆ hn[

lines.gurmukhi: qwhU qy Anyk puin, eykY eykY pwNc pwNc; qw qy cwir cwir suiq sMqiq sMBUq hY [

Unknown.translation: Then several children were born of those wives. Each bore five sons and then four more sons.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: puin bhuVo muV iqnwˆ iesqRIAwˆ qoˆ Axigxq hI b`cy aupjy: pihloˆ qwˆ iek iek qoˆ hoey pMj pMj Aru Pyr Enwˆ pMjwˆ pMjwˆ qoˆ cwr cwr puqRwˆ dI sMqwn sBUq aupjI hoeI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qw qy AwT AwT suqw, suqw suqw AwT suq; AYso prvwru kYsy hoie eyk sUq hY [228[

Unknown.translation: Each of these sons produced eight daughters and then eight sons came forth from each daughter. One who has such a big family, how can he be stringed in one thread. This is the spread of the mind. Its expanse has no end. How can a mind with such vast sprea
